Verses: 1 appozhudhu Kidhiyonaagiya Yerupaagaalum Avanodirundha Janangal Yaavarum Kaalame Ezhundhu Purappattu, Aarodh Ennum Neerootrin Kittap Paalayamiranginaargal; Meedhiyaaniyarin Paalayam Avanukku Vadakke More Mettirkup Pinnaana Pallaththaakkile Irundhadhu.

2 appozhudhu Karththar Kidhiyonai Nokki: Naan Meedhiyaaniyarai Unnodirukkira Janaththin Kaiyil Oppukkodukkiradharku Avargal Migudhiyaayirukkiraargal; En Kai Ennai Ratchiththadhu Endru Isravel Enakku Virodhamaaga Veembu Pesugiradharku Idamaagum.

3 aagaiyaal Bayamum Thigilum Ullavan Evano Avan Thirumbi, Keeleyaadh Malaigalilirundhu Viraivaai Odippogakkadavan Endru, Nee Janangalin Sevigal Ketkap Prasiththappaduththu Endraar; Appozhudhu Janaththil Irubaththeeraayiram Per Thirumbip Poivittaargal; Padhinaayiramper Meedhiyaayirundhaargal.

4 karththar Kidhiyonai Nokki: Janangal Innum Adhigam, Avargalaith Thanneerandaikku IrangippogappannuÂ ; Ange Avargalaip Pareetchiththukkaattuven; Unnodekooda Varalaam Endru Naan Yaaraik Kurikkireno, Avan Unnodekooda Varakkadavan; Unnodekooda Varalaagaadhu Endru Naan Yaaraik Kurikkireno, Avan Unnodekooda Varaadhirukkakkadavan Endraar.

5 appadiye Avan Janangalaith Thanneerandaikku Irangippogap Panninaan; Appozhudhu Karththar Kidhiyonai Nokki: Thanneerai Oru Naai Nakkum Pragaaramaaga Adhaith Than Naavinaale Nakkugiravan Evano, Avanaith Thaniyeyum, Kudikkiradharku Muzhangaal Oondrik Kunigiravan Evano, Avanaith Thaniyeyum Niruththu Endraar.
6 thangal Kaiyaal Alli, Thangal Vaaikkeduththu, Nakkikkondavargalin Lakkam Munnooruper; Matra Janangalellaam Thanneer Kudikkiradharku Muzhangaal Oondrik Kunindhaargal.

7 appozhudhu Karththar Kidhiyonai Nokki: Nakkikkudiththa Andha Munnooruperaale Naan Ungalai Ratchiththu, Meedhiyaaniyarai Un Kaiyil Oppukkoduppen, Matra Janangalellaarum Thangal Thangal Idaththirkup Pogakkadavargal Endraar.

8 appozhudhu Janangal Thangal Kaiyil Thinpandangalaiyum Ekkaalangalaiyum Eduththukkondaargal; Matra Isravelarellaaraiyum Thangal Thangal Koodaarangalukku Anuppivittu, Andha Munnooruperaimaaththiram Vaiththukkondaan; Meedhiyaaniyarin Senai Avanukkuth Thaazhvidamaana Pallaththaakkil Irundhadhu.
9 andru Raaththiri Karththar Avanai Nokki: Nee Ezhundhu, Andha Senaiyinidaththirkup Po; Adhai Un Kaiyil Oppukkoduththen.
10 poga Bayappattaayaanaal, Mudhal Neeyum Un Velaikkaaranaagiya Pooraavum Senaiyinidaththirkup Poi,

11 ange Enna Pesugiraargal Endru Kel: Pinbu Senaiyidaththirkup Poga, Un Kaigal Thidappadum Endraar; Appadiye Avanum Avan Velaikkaaranaagiya Pooraavum Senaiyin Munnaniyile Jaamam Kaakkiravargalin Idamattum Ponaargal.

12 meedhiyaaniyarum, Amalekkiyarum, Sagala Kizhakkaththip Puththirarum, Vettuk Kiligalaip Polath Thiralaaip Pallaththaakkile Paduththukkidandhaargal; Avargaludaiya Ottagangalukkum Kanakkillai, Kadarkarai Manalaippolath Thiralaayirundhadhu.

13 kidhiyon Vandhapodhu, Oruvan Matroruvanukku Oru Soppanaththai Sonnaan. Adhaavadhu: Idho Oru Soppanaththaik Kanden; Suttirundha Oru Vaarkodhumai Appam Meedhiyaaniyarin Paalayaththirku Urunduvandhadhu; Adhu Koodaaramattum Vandhapodhu, Adhai Vizhaththallik Kavizhththuppottadhu, Koodaaram Vizhundhukidandhadhu Endraan.

14 appozhudhu Matravan: Idhu Yovaasin Kumaaranaagiya Kidhiyon Ennum Isravelanudaiya Pattayame Allaamal Veralla; Dhevan Meedhiyaaniyaraiyum, Indha Senai Anaiththaiyum Avan Kaiyile Oppukkoduththaar Endraan.

15 kidhiyon Andha Soppanaththaiyum Adhin Viyaarththiyaiyum Kettapodhu, Avan Panindhukondu, Isravelin Paalayaththirkuth Thirumbivandhu: Ezhundhirungal, Karththar Meedhiyaaniyarin Paalayaththai Ungal Kaigalil Oppukkoduththaar Endru Solli,
16 andha Munnooruperai Moondru Padaiyaaga Vaguththu, Avargal Ovvoruvan Kaiyilum Oru Ekkaalaththaiyum, Verum Paanaiyaiyum, Andhap Paanaikkul Vaikkum Theevattiyaiyum Koduththu,
17 avargalai Nokki: Naan Seyvadhaip Paarththu, Appadiye Neengalum Seyyungal. Idho, Naan Paalayaththin Munnaniyil Vandhirukkumpodhu, Naan Eppadi Seygireno Appadiye Neengalum Seyyavendum.
18 naanum Ennode Irukkum Sagalamaanaperum Ekkaalam Oodhumpodhu, Neengalum Paalayaththai Sutri Engum Ekkaalangalai Oodhi, Karththarudaiya Pattayam Kidhiyonudaiya Pattayam Enbeergalaaga Endru Sonnaan.

19 nadujaamaththin Thuvakkaththil, Jaamakkaararai Maatrivaiththapinbu, Kidhiyonum Avanodirundha Nooruperum Andha Jaamaththin Thuvakkaththile Paalayaththin Munnaniyil Vandhu, Ekkaalangalai Oodhi, Thangal Kaiyilirundha Paanaigalai Udaiththaargal.

20 moondru Padaigalin Manusharum Ekkaalangalai Oodhi, Paanaigalai Udaiththu, Theevattigalaith Thangal Idadhukaigalilum, Oodhum Ekkaalangalaith Thangal Valadhu Kaigalilum Pidiththukkondu, Karththarudaiya Pattayam Kidhiyonudaiya Pattayam Endru Saththamittu,
21 paalayaththai Sutrilum Avaravar Thangal Nilaiyile Nindraargal; Appozhudhu Paalayaththil Irundhavargal Ellaarum Sidharik Kookkuralittu, Odipponaargal.

22 munnooruperum Ekkaalangalai Oodhugaiyil, Karththar Paalayamengum Oruvar Pattayaththai Oruvarukku Virodhamaai Ongappanninaar; Senaiyaanadhu Seroththilulla Pedhsiththaamattum, Thaabaaththirku Sameebamaana Aabelmekolaavin Ellaimattum Odippoyitru.
23 appozhudhu Napthali Manusharum, Aaser Manusharum, Manaaseyin Sagala Manusharumaagiya Isravelar Koodivandhu, Meedhiyaaniyaraip Pin Thodarndhuponaargal.

24 kidhiyon Eppiraayeem Malaigalengum Aatkalai Anuppi: Meedhiyaaniyarukku Virodhamaayirangi, Peththaabaraa Irukkum Yordhaanmattum Vandhu, Avargalukku Mundhith Thuraigalaik Kattikkollungal Endru Sollachchonnaan; Appadiye Eppiraayeemin Manushar Ellaarum Koodi, Peththaabaraa Irukkum Yordhaan Mattum Vandhu, Thuraigalaik Kattikkondu,

25 meedhiyaaniyarin Irandu Adhipadhigalaagiya Orebaiyum Sebaiyum Pidiththu, Orebai Orep Ennappatta Kanmalaiyilum, Sebai Sep Ennappatta Aalaiyilum Kondrupottu, Meedhiyaaniyaraith Thuraththi, Orep Sep Enbavargalin Thalaigalai Yordhaanukku Ikkaraiyilirundha Kidhiyonidaththukkuk Konduvandhaargal.
